title: Bullrider Pie
directions: ● Combine rhubarb, sugar, beaten eggs in a large bowl.
● Prepare pie crust. When rolling out crust, it is not necessary to follow Dan’s example as he admits his method involves piecing together the pie crust in roughly 2-inch pieces!
● Pour filling into pie crust. Cover with top crust. Sprinkle sugar on top. Bake at 400◦F for 10 minutes, until crust starts to brown then for 30 minutes more at 350°F, or until rhubarb is soft.
